pages.text: Now we're onto the next part of the entire spill of things! Where we now need to create a Liroth Splitter. $(br) $(br)The machine is going to require a Liroth Gem and a Liroth Charge in order to operate however.

pages.title: Lirothian Separator
pages.text: The Lirothian Separator is a machine that will separate the Liroth Gem itself into three different dusts in the next entry once you've created the machine and place the gem with a charge in it.
The next dimension is built using that sand in the biome of scavengers.
pages.name: The Damnation Portal

pages.title: Damned Teleporter
pages.text: The Damnation Teleporter is a device that requires less resources in general but there's the risk of suffocation... $(l)CRAFT THIS TO ADD MORE ENTRIES! THIS IS MANDATORY!
This is how you make the charge that would activate the framed portal however if need be.
